body.p:
HCON 20 EH
113th CONGRESS
1st Session
H. CON. RES. 20
CONCURRENT RESOLUTION.Con.Res.20

inserted.p: Begun and held at the City of Washington on Thursday,
the third day of January, two thousand and thirteen

p.em: Resolved by the House of Representatives (the Senate concurring),

body.h3: SECTION 1. USE OF ROTUNDA FOR CEREMONY TO AWARD CONGRESSIONAL GOLD MEDAL TO PROFESSOR MUHAMMAD YUNUS.

ul.p: The rotunda of the Capitol is authorized to be used on April 17, 2013, for a ceremony to award the Congressional Gold Medal to Professor Muhammad Yunus in recognition of his contributions to the fight against global poverty. Physical preparations for the ceremony shall be carried out in accordance with such conditions as the Architect of the Capitol may prescribe.

body.p:
Clerk of the House of Representatives March 6, 2013.
Attest:
Clerk.
113th CONGRESS
1st Session
H. CON. RES. 20
CONCURRENT RESOLUTIONPermitting the use of the rotunda of the Capitol for a ceremony to award the Congressional Gold Medal to Professor Muhamad Yunus.
